1.「航海に出られるのは 次に潮が変わっちまう| ８月７日までの間だけだ。| また: I can only sail until August 7th, when the|tide changes. Come back soon!

3.「これで ハイスコアの目標を| 全部 達成しちまったな！| まったく 驚かせてく: Hey, you hit all the high score goals! Ya|never cease to amaze me!|<bw_break>

4.「これで トータルスコアの目標を| 達成しちまったな！| まったく 驚かせてくれ:
Hey, you hit all the high score goals! Ya|never cease to amaze me!|
|You've got all of my best stuff, so I'm|fresh out!|
|From now on, for every 1 million points you|earn, I'll give ya a Champion's Heart.|
|If you give those Champion Hearts to that|monstie next to me, ya might get somethin'|good.|
|Careful though, after this sailin' season's|over, all of yer Champion Hearts'll go|bye-bye.|

5.「グハハッ！ 今度の航海も 大成功だ！| おかげで オレはガッポガッポの大儲け。: Gahaha! The voyage was a success! I made lots|of money thanks to you. I can't thank you|enough!|<bw_break>

6.「グハハハッ！| まったく 危ねえ所だったが| 航海が無事に終わって 感無量だぜ:
Gahaha! I'm so glad that voyage ended well!!|
|I recovered the goods ya picked up and gave|each a score based on their value.|
|You'll be rewarded when yer total score and|high score hit certain goals.|
|Your high score is yer best score record in a|single voyage.|
|Your total score is the combined score of|all of yer voyages.|

7.「それじゃ また 航海に参加してくれよ！: Anyways, let's go on another voyage together!

8.「おっ！ ハイスコアが| <%nB_SCORE>Ｐを 超えてるじゃないか！|<b:
Whoa! Your high score's over <%dB_SCORE> points!|
|Here, take this! You get the|<%sB_HOUSYU> for such an awesome score!

9.「……って あんた どうぐかばんが| いっぱいで 持てねえじゃねえか！| バカヤ: ...but your item bag is full! Dummy! Go get|rid of some stuff, then come back!

10.「おう よく来たな！ あんたにゃ| 前回の航海での 報酬を渡せてなかったはずだ。: Oh, you're back! I never got a chance to|reward ya for the last voyage. Here, take|it...|<bw_break>

13.「おっ！ トータルスコアが| <%nB_SCORE>Ｐを 超えてるじゃないか！|:
Wow! Your total score's over <%dB_SCORE> points!|
|Here, take this! You get the|<%sB_HOUSYU> for such an awesome score!

14.「すまんな。残念だが 今は| 航海に出ることはできねえんだ。| その情熱は 大切: Sorry, but I can't go sailin' right now...|Please save your excitement.

15.「あんたは パーティを組んでるから| お仲間も 一緒に航海に誘うぜ。| それじゃ: You're in a party, so you'll all come with|me on the voyage. That good with you?|<yesno><close>

16.「おうっ！| キリキリ働いて ガッポリかせいでくれよ！| それじゃあ 出発の準備: Ah! Make sure you do a good job and earn me|lots of money! So ya ready to go?|<yesno><close>

17.「よしきた！ それじゃあ| あんたに 乗組員の仕事を説明するぜ。|<br>|「幻:
Okay, I'll explain the crewmate's job to ya.|
|In the Phantom Sea Trashka, for who knows what|reason, stuff just randomly falls from the|sky.|
|Junk, monsters, you name it. Anyways, your|job is to pick up anything worth pickin' up.|
|I'll score ya based on the value of the stuff|you pick up. I'll also reward ya based on|how well ya do!|
|Let's practice just once before a real voyage.|That sound good to you?|

18.「報酬は ２種類あるぜ！ ハイスコア報酬と| トータルスコア報酬さ。それぞれ目標: There're two types of rewards: high score and|total score. Each time you surpass a|goal, I'll reward ya!|<break>

19.「報酬の浮き輪は 装備することで| 航海で役に立つ効果を発揮するぜ。| スコアを: The floaties are meant as a reward to help|improve your score. If you wear one, you'll|bring in the big bucks.

20.「フレンドか 同じチームに入っている| チームメンバーが 航海に参加していれば|:
You can see the score rankings of yer friends|and Team members.|
|But it doesn't look like any of 'em have gone|voyagin' yet.

21.「幻の海トラシュカでは どういうわけか| 空から ワケのわからねえものが| 次:
In the Phantom Sea Trashka, for who knows what|reason, stuff just randomly falls from the|sky.|
|Junk, monsters, you name it. Anyways, your|job is to pick up anything worth pickin' up.|
|I'll score ya based on the value of the stuff|you pick up. I'll also reward ya based on|how well ya do!|
|If the entire crew falls overboard, the voyage|fails and you lose everything you collected.|

22.「航海には オレが かき集めた| 乗組員８人が 参加するぜ。| なかま同士 せい:
I'll bring together a crew of 8 people with me|on this voyage. I hope you all will get along.|
|If you want to voyage with people you know,|form a party and you'll be in the same|voyage.|
|If you come with a party of 4, you can choose|another nearby party of 4 to go on an 8|person voyage together.|

24.「あんたには ハイスコアと| トータルスコアが 目標に達した時に| 報酬を くれ:
You'll be rewarded when yer total score and|high score hit certain goals.|
|Your high score is yer best score record in a|single voyage.|
|Your total score is the combined score of|all of yer voyages.|
|If you wanna peek at the available rewards,|choose "View Rewards".

25.「フレンドや 同じチームのメンバーが| 航海に参加していれば ランキングで| ハ:
If yer friends and Team members are goin' on|voyages too, you can compete for the highest|ranking!|
|You won't get anything for a high rank other|than just braggin' rights! Gwahaha!|

27.「おうっ！| 何について 聞きたいんだ？|<break>: Hey! What do you want to ask?|<break>

29.「オレは 幻の海トラシュカへの航海に参加する| 乗組員を 集めている！ 危険のと: I'm recruitin' crewmates to voyage with me to|the Phantom Sea Trashka. It's dangerous, so|I'm lookin' for the courageous type!|<break>

31.「なんだい やめちまうのか。| 他に 用はあるかい？ |<break>: Changed your mind? What else do ya need?|<break>

34.「あんたは パーティを組んでるから| お仲間同士で 同じ航海に| 参加してもらお:
You're in a party, so you and your mates|will voyage together with me.|
|Get yer party leader to talk to me.

35.「よしきた！ それじゃあ| あんたに 乗組員の仕事を説明するぜ。|<br>|「だ: Okay, I'll explain the crewmate's job to ya.|Hang on, though, ya gotta be alone for this,|so leave your party, will ya?

37.「……って あんた そうびぶくろが| いっぱいで 持てねえじゃねえか！| バカヤ: ...but your equipment bag is full! Dummy! Go|get rid of some stuff, then come back!

39.「オレは 幻の海トラシュカへの| 航海に参加する 乗組員を 集めている。|<br:
I'm gathering a crew to voyage with me to the|Phantom Sea Trashka.|
|But this time of year is bad for boats with|the tide 'n all. If yer interested, come|back later.

40.「航海に出られる時期が来たら| あんたにも 報せるぜ。| 楽しみに 待ってろよ。: When it's time to sail again, I'll let|ya know. Lookin' forward to it!

41.「それじゃ また 航海に参加してくれよ！: Anyways, let's go on another voyage together!

44.「航海に出れる時期になったら| 新しいラインナップを用意するぜ。| 楽しみに 待: When it's time to sail again, I'll have a new|line-up for you. Hope yer looking forward to|it!

The currents around Trashka're so strong, I|can only sail out there at certain times|of the year.|
